alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 10:34AM CST until December 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River near White Oak Park ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 4.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 AM CST Monday was 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to flood stage this evening. It will then rise to 4.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon to 3.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to 4.1 feet Wednesday morning. It will fall below flood stage again early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 4.2 Mon 6 am CST 4.1 4.0 3.8 &&
